name: Deadlock (itch) (MReex)
description:
DEADLOCK

Deadlock is a singleplayer FPS game, it's like insurgency but with bad graphics and added more speed

I just make this game because I like insurgency sandstorm and doom, and because I wanted to try making a good shoter, this game shows a bit how I improved my skills, the models are much better than the other ones I made before.

This version is made for showing the basic of the game and for geting feedback

*Sorry if I still not knowing how to talk in english properly, the game may have gramatical errors, so please tell me if you see any gramatical error

CONTROLS
Move [W,A,S,D]
Jump [Space]
Shot [Mouse left]
Check ammo [F]
Reload [R]

Development process
